propagate(bytes32).details: propagates the populated cross net message for the given cid

params.msgCid: - the cid of the cross-net message

sendUserXnetMessage(((((uint64,address[].details: sends a general-purpose cross-message from the local subnet to the destination subnet. IMPORTANT: `msg.value` is expected to equal to the value sent in `crossMsg.value` plus the cross-messaging fee.
